characters.story: "MAY?" the woman questions curiously - is she a matchmaker, a go-between for the birth?
"MAY?" the fire questions curiously - is this coal, a mineral fuel?
"MOH?" the words question curiously - is this a scheme, a plot and conspiracy?
"CHEE?" the tree questions curiously - chess, a board game of strategy?
"CHEE!" he sings cheerfully while trying to dupe, deceive and cheat!
"CHEE?" the flag questions curiously - painted by an inexperienced artist?
"SIH!" the mouth and sphinx sing cheerfully but hoarse, raspy and harsh!
"SIH!" the fingers and sphinx sing cheerfully - to rip, tear and shred!
"KAN!" the soil and Hercules sing cheerfully - to tolerate, endure and withstand!
"KAN!" the tremendous Hercules and muscle sing cheerfully - to survey, investigate and inspect!
The purse, maestro and road bend down drooping - to dispatch, send for fun and mockery!
The words and dispatch bend down drooping - to censure, condemn and blame!
"NAHNG?" the top hat, purse, crown and pidgeon coop question curiously - is this a sack, a bag for perfume?
"KWAY!" the water commands sharply - to burst, collapse and rupture!
"GWAY!" the tree commands sharply - a cupboard, cabinet and closet!
"YEE?" the house questions curiously - is it fitting, appropriate and suitable?
"YEE!" the words and fitting command sharply - friendship, comradeship and gifts!
"DZOO!" the grain sings cheerfully - to rent, lease and hire!
